## Branch Naming

Please ensure your branch follows the naming convention:
`feature/{member}-{short-desc}`

Examples:
- `feature/adithyan-whatsapp-generator`
- `feature/lestlin-dispatch-twilio`
- `feature/basil-pptx-templates`
